content.raw:
Just out of curiosity? Are you using Z shell? If so that’s totally fine. I want to make sure that you’re not sourcing the wrong setup file if you’re using bash as most of the people use.

\(1\) `No model` looks OK to me.

\(2\) A more comprehensive name would be better but if it’s more involved, the default one is fine.

\(3\) It might be related with the symbolic links created. ~~I’ll try to see if I can reproduce it.~~ Confirmed: It happens to me too. There's a loop because `/home/developer/vrx_ws/src/vrx/vrx_gazebo/models/vrx_gazebo/models` points back to `/home/developer/vrx_ws/src/vrx/vrx_gazebo/models/`.
content.html:
Just out of curiosity? Are you using Z shell? If so that’s totally fine. I want to make sure that you’re not sourcing the wrong setup file if you’re using bash as most of the people use.

(1) No model looks OK to me.

(2) A more comprehensive name would be better but if it’s more involved, the default one is fine.

(3) It might be related with the symbolic links created. I’ll try to see if I can reproduce it. Confirmed: It happens to me too. There's a loop because /home/developer/vrx_ws/src/vrx/vrx_gazebo/models/vrx_gazebo/models points back to /home/developer/vrx_ws/src/vrx/vrx_gazebo/models/.
